item.title: Discarded effects: a common pitfall when working with Scala IO monads
item.description:
One thing that I would be certainly missing if I was to drop Scala in favor of another programming language is a mechanism to suspend the execution of side effects.

This programming technique is available in Scala thanks to the popular Cats Effects l...
